Troubleshooting¶

SQLite Error: no column named shape¶

Cause: The API returned a new field not present in the existing table schema.

Resolution: Schema alignment runs automatically before insertion. If the error persists:

  • delete the existing SQLite file

  • rebuild the archive

No such table¶

Check table names:

get_archive_status(db_path)

Ensure the reporting function references the correct table.

Mineral Extraction Database
